title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 14-1.141 - Definition of indirect drain
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 14-1.141 - Definition of indirect drain

State Regulations

An indirect drain is a waste line which does not connect directly with the drainage system, but conveys and discharges liquid wastes through an air break into an approved plumbing fixture or receptacle, directly connected to the drainage system. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
§§
14-1.141

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
